import React, {useState} from 'react' const CreateNewBlogWindow = ({addBlog}) => { const [title, setTitle] = useState() const [url, setUrl] = useState() const [author, setAuthor] = useState() const handleNewBlog = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let newBlog = {title: title, url: url, author: author} console.log('posting blog:', newBlog); blogService.postNewBlog(newBlog) setTitle('') setUrl('') setAuthor('') addBlog(newBlog) } return ( <>
